author: @Web Desk
title: Blake Shelton gets candid about being a stepdad to Gwen Stefani's children
text: April 19, 2024 Blake Shelton just expressed how much he enjoys and adores being a father to Gwen Stefani’s children. In an exclusive interview with Entertainment Tonight, the 47-year-old country singer opened up about being a stepdad to three boys, Kingston, Zuma and Apollo, who Stefani she shares with ex, Gavin Rossdale. As he discussed his tenth year anniversary on meeting Stefani, he talked about how he pictured his future with her. "If I could have a repeat of these past 10 years, (that) would be perfect. Next month, we've got an 18-year-old, which it blows my mind that already happened,” he told the outlet. Shelton continued, “And in a couple of years, we'll have another 18-year-old. And that's...it's gonna be a lot more alone time, which I'm not mad about that either." "But we still have Apollo, so we have another almost 10 years before we can kick him out, so it should be a lot of fun," the God’s Country singer added. Blake Shelton further explained that Stefani's three boys transformed him positively "in every possible way" after he became their stepdad after tying the knot with the Purple Irises singer back in 2021.

author: Trueman
title: Balaram Moondh Secures Multipurpose Veterinary Hospital For Baytu
text:
Baytu’s farmers and livestock owners have received wonderful news. The Government First-Class Veterinary Hospital in Baytu has been upgraded to a multipurpose veterinary hospital, thanks to the dedicated efforts and persistent advocacy of BJP leader Balaram Moondh. This significant upgrade highlights Moondh’s unwavering commitment to the welfare of his constituents and his effective leadership.
Balaram Moondh, a stalwart in Baytu’s political and social landscape, has been tirelessly working for the region’s development for many years. His consistent efforts included multiple meetings with Chief Minister Bhajan Lal Sharma and Minister of Animal Husbandry and Dairy, Shri Joraram Kumawat, to emphasize the need for enhanced veterinary services in Baytu. Moondh’s dedication has finally paid off, ensuring that Baytu’s agricultural and livestock sectors receive the support they need.
The recent budget, presented by Chief Minister Bhajan Lal Sharma and Finance Minister Diya Kumari, has been hailed as historic. It focuses on the welfare of farmers, youth, and women, offering interest-free loans for farmers and announcing 100,000 new job recruitments for unemployed youth. This budget also includes the approval of a central bus stand for Baytu and a 3 crore rupee budget for the reconstruction of the Social Welfare Hostel at the Patodi Panchayat Samiti headquarters in Baytu, further demonstrating Moondh’s effective advocacy.
The upgrade of the veterinary hospital is a major milestone for Baytu. It will provide advanced medical facilities for livestock, which is crucial for the predominantly agricultural community. This development is expected to significantly enhance the quality of veterinary care, improve livestock health, and consequently boost the region’s agricultural productivity.
Balaram Moondh’s persistent efforts and strategic leadership have brought tangible benefits to Baytu. His role in securing these approvals demonstrates his commitment to the region’s development and his ability to navigate the political landscape to deliver results for his constituents. This achievement not only underscores his dedication but also sets a precedent for effective advocacy and leadership.
As Baytu continues to benefit from these developments, the community expresses deep gratitude for Moondh’s relentless efforts. His work exemplifies the positive impact that dedicated and focused leadership can have on regional development.
Balaram Moondh’s contributions will undoubtedly pave the way for further progress in Baytu, enhancing both the agricultural sector and overall quality of life for its residents.

author: Paul Terpstra
title: iPhone SE 4 Set to Boost Apple Intelligence with Affordability
text:
Apple’s anticipated iPhone SE 4 may play a pivotal role in promoting the company’s Apple Intelligence technology. Set to launch in early 2025, the iPhone SE 4 aims to attract budget-conscious customers while introducing them to features from Apple’s flagship devices. Analysts believe that offering Apple Intelligence on a lower-cost model will help Apple reach a broader audience.
Targeting the Affordable Market
The iPhone SE series has long appealed to users looking for an affordable entry into the Apple ecosystem. With the SE 4, Apple is expected to continue this trend, but with upgrades that set it apart from previous models. According to Morgan Stanley, the SE 4 will borrow features from the iPhone 14, such as an OLED display. With these improvements and Apple Intelligence, the SE 4 could become a strong alternative to older models on the market.
Expanding Apple Intelligence
Apple Intelligence, Apple’s AI-driven technology, enhances user experience through personalization and predictive capabilities. By integrating this tech into the SE 4, Apple allows more users to experience its benefits. Analysts predict that Apple could sell 15 to 20 million SE 4 units due to the appeal of this feature alone.
A Strategic Move for Apple
Adding Apple Intelligence to a budget-friendly model could drive adoption and attract new users. Given that iPhone 16 sales have fallen short of expectations, the SE 4 offers a valuable opportunity for Apple to capture market share in the lower-cost smartphone segment. Moreover, the SE 4 may attract not only existing Apple users but also Android users considering a switch.
Overall, the iPhone SE 4’s blend of affordability and advanced features reflects Apple’s strategy to make its technology accessible to a wider audience. If these predictions hold true, the SE 4 could help Apple succeed with Apple Intelligence and bring in millions of new customers in 2025.

author: FogãoNET
title: ReforÃ§o do AtlÃ©tico-MG, JÃºnior Santos se despede do Botafogo: â€˜Obrigado por tudo. Carinho eterno por este clubeâ€™
text:
Negociado com o Atlético-MG para a temporada 2025, Júnior Santos fez postagem se despedindo do Botafogo nesta quinta-feira (23/1). O atacante agradeceu nas redes sociais pelo período que viveu no Glorioso.
“Obrigado por tudo, Botafogo!!! Foi uma honra vestir essa camisa histórica e poder conquistar títulos importantes. Só tenho a agradecer por tudo o que vivemos juntos. Carinho eterno por este clube“, escreveu.
Campeão da Libertadores e do Campeonato Brasileiro, Júnior Santos foi vendido por US$ 8 milhões (cerca de R$ 50 milhões) pelo Botafogo ao Atlético-MG.
